trans-unit.source: Represents a 2-D geometric shape defined by the combination of two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una forma geometrica 2D definita dalla combinazione di due oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode%2A> property specifies how the two geometries will be combined.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode%2A> proprietà specifica come vengono combinate due geometrie.

trans-unit.source: Note that <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> combines the area specified by two geometries, so geometries that do not have area (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>) disappear when combined.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> combina l'area specificata da due geometrie, pertanto geometrie prive di area (ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>) scompaiono quando combinate.

trans-unit.source: Geometries can be combined in several ways: using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>, or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> class.
trans-unit.target: Le geometrie possono essere combinate in diversi modi: utilizzando un <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>, un <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A> metodo il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup> creates a composite geometry from one or more <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> objects.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup> crea una geometria composta da una o più <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> uses a specified boolean operation to combine the area described by two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> objects.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> Usa un'operazione booleana specificata per combinare l'area descritta da due <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The static <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> class behaves in exactly the same manner as the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> object.
trans-unit.target: Statica <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A> metodo il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> classe si comporta esattamente come il <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Careful thought should be involved when using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> to perform a union as it can be very CPU-expensive.
trans-unit.target: Da coinvolgere prestare particolare attenzione quando si utilizza un <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> per eseguire un'unione come può essere dispendioso in termini di CPU.

trans-unit.source: In most cases, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A> will work better.
trans-unit.target: Nella maggior parte dei casi, un <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup> o <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A> sarà più idoneo.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> only when any of the following apply:
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> solo quando una qualsiasi delle condizioni seguenti:

trans-unit.source: The geometric operation is not a union.
trans-unit.target: L'operazione geometrica non è un'unione.

trans-unit.source: Either of the geometries have a <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule.EvenOdd> and the geometries are self-intersecting (i.e. the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> actually matters).
trans-unit.target: Delle geometrie avere un <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> valore <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule.EvenOdd> e intersecate le geometrie (vale a dire il <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> è rilevante).

trans-unit.source: Time is not a concern, but space is (for instance, if the geometry is created once and then cached).
trans-unit.target: Ora non è un problema, ma è lo spazio (ad esempio, se la geometria viene creata una sola volta e quindi memorizzata nella cache).

trans-unit.source: Typically, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> produces smaller output than <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>.
trans-unit.target: In genere, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> produce l'output di dimensioni inferiori rispetto a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The resulting geometry will be stroked or used in a path animation and <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A> does not provide the desired outline.
trans-unit.target: La geometria risultante verrà tracciata o utilizzata in un percorso di animazione e <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A> non fornisce la struttura desiderata.

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features
trans-unit.target: Funzionalità di Freezable

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> è un tipo di <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni su <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> funzionalità, ad esempio il blocco e la clonazione, vedere il [panoramica sugli oggetti Freezable](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" />.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> to combine.
trans-unit.target: Primo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> da combinare.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> to combine.
trans-unit.target: Secondo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> da combinare.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> con gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> specificati.

trans-unit.source: The method by which <c>geometry1</c> and <c>geometry2</c> are combined.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo mediante il quale vengono combinate <c>geometria1</c> e <c>geometria2</c>.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> to combine.
trans-unit.target: Primo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> da combinare.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> to combine.
trans-unit.target: Secondo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> da combinare.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> objects and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> con gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode" /> specificati.

trans-unit.source: The method by which <c>geometry1</c> and <c>geometry2</c> are combined.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo mediante il quale vengono combinate <c>geometria1</c> e <c>geometria2</c>.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> to combine.
trans-unit.target: Primo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> da combinare.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> to combine.
trans-unit.target: Secondo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> da combinare.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform" /> applied to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform" /> applicato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> objects, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> con gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> specificati, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that specifies the bounding box of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> che specifica il riquadro dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" />.

trans-unit.source: **Note:** This method does not take any pens into account.
trans-unit.target: **Nota:** il metodo non prende in considerazione le penne.

trans-unit.source: The bounding box of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" />.
trans-unit.target: Riquadro dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" />.

trans-unit.source: If animations are present, the base values of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> object are used to calculate the bounding box.
trans-unit.target: Se le animazioni sono presenti, i valori di base di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> oggetto vengono utilizzati per calcolare il rettangolo di selezione.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Crea un clone modificabile di questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" />, eseguendo copie complete dei valori dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Durante la copia delle proprietà di dipendenza, questo metodo copia i riferimenti alle risorse e i data binding (che potrebbero non essere più risolti), ma non le animazioni né i relativi valori correnti.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Clone modificabile dell'oggetto corrente.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> dell'oggetto clonato sarà <see langword="false" />, anche se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> dell'oggetto di origine è <see langword="true." />.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetti (o qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Crea un clone modificabile dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" />, eseguendo copie complete dei valori correnti di tale oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: I riferimenti alle risorse, i data binding e le animazioni non vengono copiati, ma vengono copiati i relativi valori correnti.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Clone modificabile dell'oggetto corrente.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> dell'oggetto clonato sarà <see langword="false" />, anche se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> dell'oggetto di origine è <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetti (o qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> object of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il primo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> di questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" />.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> object to combine.
trans-unit.target: Primo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> da combinare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode%2A> property specifies how the two geometries will be combined.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode%2A> proprietà specifica come vengono combinate due geometrie.

trans-unit.source: Note that <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> combines the area specified by two geometries, so geometries that do not have area (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>) disappear when combined.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> combina l'area specificata da due geometrie, pertanto geometrie prive di area (ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>) scompaiono quando combinate.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo dell'identificatore

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Impostare le proprietà dei metadati `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: nessuno

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry1" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la proprietà di dipendenza <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry1" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> object of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il secondo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Secondo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode%2A> property specifies how the two geometries will be combined.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode%2A> proprietà specifica come vengono combinate due geometrie.

trans-unit.source: Note that <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> combines the area specified by two geometries, so geometries that do not have area (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>) disappear when combined.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> combina l'area specificata da due geometrie, pertanto geometrie prive di area (ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>) scompaiono quando combinate.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo dell'identificatore

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Impostare le proprietà dei metadati `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: nessuno

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry2" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la proprietà di dipendenza <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry2" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the method by which the two geometries (specified by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry1" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry2" /> properties) are combined.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il metodo dal quale sono combinate le due geometrie specificate dalle proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry1" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry2" />).

trans-unit.source: The method by which <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry1" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry2" /> are combined.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo dal quale sono combinati <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry1" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry2" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.GeometryCombineMode.Union" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.GeometryCombineMode.Union" />.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo dell'identificatore

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Impostare le proprietà dei metadati `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: nessuno

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la proprietà di dipendenza <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode" />.

trans-unit.source: The computational tolerance of error.
trans-unit.target: Tolleranza di errore in termini di calcolo.

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the error tolerance will be interpreted.
trans-unit.target: Specifica come verrà interpretata la tolleranza di errore.

trans-unit.source: Gets the area of the filled region.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'area della regione riempita.

trans-unit.source: The area of the filled region of this combined geometry.
trans-unit.target: Area della regione riempita di questa geometria combinata.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> object is empty.
trans-unit.target: Determina se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> è vuoto o meno.

trans-unit.source: **true** if this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> is empty; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true** se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> è vuoto, in caso contrario, **false**.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> object may have curved segments.
trans-unit.target: Determina se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> può presentare o meno segmenti curvi.

trans-unit.source: **true** if this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> object may have curved segments; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true** se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry" /> può presentare segmenti curvi; in caso contrario, **false**.
